extendedInfo.description: Hydrator will alert / remind you when you need to drink another glass of water. Climate, health and diet all change the amount of water you need to consume on a daily basis. You can set your own target as per your need.  Hydrator also allows you to set your own glass size.  Amount of water we drink has a significant effect on our overall health and well-being. With your water intake, a good rule of thumb to follow is at least 64 ounces a day. That's eight 8-oz glasses of liquid within 24 hours. Seems simple, but the problem is that almost everyone forget to drink while is busy with everyday things. Not anymore!Features:a)	Water Intake Journal: Keep track you daily water intake. Update your water intake with a click of a button. Water intake also keeps track of how many ounce you are consuming daily.b)	Manage daily target: Set your daily target. c)	Configure glass size.Feel free to email your suggestion  at happconRocks@gmail.com.All new Hydrator is coming soon

reviews.title: Straightforward
reviews.comment: Super easy to setup. Pick when to start and finish each day. Nice that I don\'t have to restart the app each day. Wish it did metric.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Lets me set my goal and paces it with the reminder
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Top app just what i wanted highly recommend
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not too sure
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t find an option to specify units of measure. I work in mls, and oz were the only available measures. I can\'t comment on how the rest of the app works, as once I found it lacked this feature, I found another water tracker app to use.
reviews.author: Pennie Hume

reviews.comment: I would rate it excellent if only i could change the notification tone .....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No support for international metric unit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved this app.reminder works great for me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not A Bad App
reviews.comment: I just found other apps that work better for me than this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: 1St day let\'s see how I like
